Detailed Description

Contains helper methods to make setting some callbacks easier, but also fixes how reparenting items breaks widgets in default QTreeWidget implementation: See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/25559221/qtreewidgetitem-issue-items-set-using-setwidgetitem-are-dispearring-after-movin
